@graph.caption: Vegan Nachos with Pumpkin Cheese Sauce

@graph.name: Vegan Nachos with Pumpkin Queso Dip - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These vegan nachos with homemade pumpkin queso dip are perfect for lazy movie nights. They' re also a real crowd pleaser at parties!

@graph.name: Vegan Nachos with Pumpkin Cheese Sauce
@graph.description: These vegan nachos with homemade pumpkin queso dip are perfect for lazy movie nights. They' re also a real crowd pleaser at parties!
recipeIngredient: 1 small red pointed pepper, cut into rings
1/4 cup black olives, cut into rings

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the cashews in water. Bring a medium pot of water to boil. Cut the butternut squash into small pieces and cook them for about 10 minutes or until they are really soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the cashews in water. Bring a medium pot of water to boil. Cut the butternut squash into small pieces and cook them for about 10 minutes or until they are really soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain both the butternut squash and the cashews and place them into a blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain both the butternut squash and the cashews and place them into a blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the nachos into a big bowl and add the jalapeños, red onion, red pointed pepper, black olives, guacamole, tomato salsa, and tomatoes. In a small pan, heat the vegan pumpkin cheese sauce until it becomes really thick and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the nachos into a big bowl and add the jalapeños, red onion, red pointed pepper, black olives, guacamole, tomato salsa, and tomatoes. In a small pan, heat the vegan pumpkin cheese sauce until it becomes really thick and creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour it onto the nachos until they're nicely covered. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour it onto the nachos until they're nicely covered. Serve immediately.
